comment: The worst professor I have ever had. I normally do not go based off of rate my professor since I normally am I straight A student, but she is making that almost impossible. Her tests are actually impossible, and her quizzes are even worse. If you even want to pass do not take her. I could go on and on about her, and she does nothing to help.

This lab was genuinely ridiculous. I have never left a review before and I've had multiple difficult professors in the past but she is by far the most difficult I've ever had. The weekly quizzes were lockdown webcam, no notes, 11 min for 11 questions, some written response, and worth 70% of your grade. Take anyone else if you care about your grade.

Lab is easy enough, but makes getting a good grade more difficult than other micro lab sections. Pre lab quizzes are 70% of your grade, they are lockdown + webcam, no noted allowed and free response sections. The lab manuals that the quizzes are on are very lengthy. Teaches well but be prepared to use the entire time.

She is incredibly condescending, she does not answer question in a way that makes sense, and she provides no resources to the class. We had a quiz that was four questions with multiple parts for each question and we were given two minutes to complete it. Tests are incredibly confusing. Save your GPA, dont take this class.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Easily the worst and most counter productive teacher I've ever had. She lectures about how much we disappoint her and makes you feel stupid for answering questions. She doesn't post the lecture slides. Quizzes are impossibly short and she doesn't allow you to see what you go wrong. DO NOT TAKE HER. No matter what it isn't worth it.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: an actual living hell. if you want to save your gpa. still have your dignity. most importantly still have your sanity, DO NOT EVER IN YOUR LIFE TAKE HER
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Her grading is basically passing those she feels like passing. Your answers to her quizzes could be identical to what she says in her own lab manual as well as other students, yet she'll still mark your response wrong. Often makes fun of students when they make a simple mistake. Quite honestly the worst and least caring professor I've had at KSU.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Avoid at all costs! she gives impossible quizzes that are all hand written and expects a very specific answer in very limited amounts of time, and make sure you have memorized how to spell everything in the manual or you will lose a valuable point on her tests. I had to drop this class because of the amount of stress it caused me.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Terrible. Not understanding, demeaning if you make a mistake, doesn't like to answer questions, goes on tangents, lab often goes 15 minutes overtime. Quizzes are free response, over in 3 mins (8-10 questions), and are super stressful. !HALF THE CLASS DROPPED! I got As in all my other classes except this one, this class is impossible. Fair warning.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Worst class ever!!!! Avoid at all cost if you want to save your GPA. We had what felt like 2 seconds quizzes which she took off points for everything (drops lowest), a streak plate and unknown report. She made the quizzes almost impossible to pass and would take up half the lab time lecturing then would rush us because we're running out of time.

Absolutely terrible lab professor. Quizzes each lab that covers the manual BUT she only gives you about 5 minutes so I never fully finished. Those quizzes are the only grades. She is terrible at teaching the content and doesn't listen to her students' questions or feedback. Expects you to know everything before learning any of it. AVOID HER!!!!!!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Avoid taking her for any class at ALL cost. I read these reviews prior to taking her & thought She cant be that bad, right?? Wrong. She provides no feedback on any missed questions from tests or assignments, theres no extra or partial credit, help, or even communication. Even the department head did nothing when half the class raised concerns.

Please do not take this Professor. Took her online lab course (during pandemic) and it was a nightmare. Assignments have extremely impossible time constraints, she is awfully boring, robotic, and lacks empathy. Her class average was terribly low and it was hard to perform well on her quizzes. She does not care about her students success at all!!!
